code:
sequenceDiagram
actor Dev
participant GitHub
participant Runner
Dev->>GitHub: triggers "Codebase Mindmap"
GitHub->>Runner: dispatch
loop Codebase Mindmap
Runner->>Runner: job build
Runner-->>Runner: Checkout
Runner-->>Runner: Setup Node.js
Runner-->>Runner: Install markmap-cli
Runner-->>Runner: Generate Markdown map
Runner-->>Runner: Build Markmap HTML
Runner-->>Runner: Upload artifact (Education_ContentCDN)
Runner-->>Runner: Upload Pages artifact
Runner->>Runner: job deploy
Runner-->>Runner: Deploy to GitHub Pages
end
repo_description: DMARRSS - Decentralized Machine Assisted Rapid Response Security System, leveraging LLM-inspired architecture and neural networks to detect, prioritize, and respond to threat events in distributed sys

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由job build、job deploy组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是job build、job deploy应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达job build、job deploy结束。
